name: MobileLy
technology: React, react router, MongoDB, firebase Authentication, React Query, node.js, express.js, Tailwind, daisyUI, jwt token, react icon etc...
feature: This is A Second hand phone selling site. Any one can be seller and user.
This site have 3 role. User role,admin role  and Seller role
A seller can sell product
This site has service Details route.
In this site Has Log in authentication and sing Up page.
It has been Private route. For given a service review must have login user.
It has a Blog page . where has 4 question Ans.

name: Crazy Travel
technology: React, react router, MongoDB, firebase Authentication, React Query, node.js, express.js, Tailwind, daisyUI, jwt token, react icon etc...
feature: This is A Travel service Selling & review site. A single person Sale his Travel related service .
This site have 2 role. User role and Seller role
A user can see service. and give feedback or Review for service.
This site has service Details route.
In this site Has Log in authentication and sing Up page.
It has been Private route. For given a service review must have login user.
It has a Blog page . where has 4 question Ans.
